byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la 'di skad smras so/ /sa chen po 'di g.yos par gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin/ rkyen gang yin/ chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams byon pa med pa dang / bzhud pa med pa bshad pa 'di khyod kyis dris/ ngas bshad pa na/ srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur/ bye ba phrag brgyad bcus bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ srog chags stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi ni rdul med cing dri ma med par gyur nas/ chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud pa med

pa'i chos bshad pa 'di yongs su dris pa las/ sems can 'di snyed cig gi don byas pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa

ba ni de nyid kyis chog go/ /da phyin chad ni bdag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i the tshom mi 'byung / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba la dogs pa med

do snyam nas de dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba de nyid dang ldan pas/ shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la gnas te/ 'di snyam du bdag 'di ltar bar

snang la 'dug pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la cis mchod snyam du bsams pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par

rab tu ngu ba nam mkha' la 'phags pa mthong nas de sems la yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes te lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag de la byin nas 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod me tog 'di dag gis 'phags pa

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa byos shig /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng sems can stong phrag mang po rnams kyi don byas par gyur pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod la nged

kyis phan gdags so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar spro bar byas pa de lta bur/ gang sems can thams cad kyi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de lta bu dag rab tu dkon no/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog man dA ra ba dag blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la bdag gi lus kyis kyang bkab nas tshig 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod la deng phan chad g.yog bya ba'i phyir bdag gi lus kyang 'bul lo

zhes nas/ de bar snang las babs te bdag phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang bu mo lnga brgya po de dag
gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod la bdag cag kyang 'di ltar lus 'bul lo/ /bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos
de dag nyid thob par gyur cig /phyin chad kyang khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byed par gyur cig /khyod dang lhan cig tu gnas par gyur

cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang bu mo lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad smras so/ /bu mo khyod snying nas nga'i bsam pa dang 'thun

par byed cing / snying nas nga la lus 'bul na ni nga yang khyed len to/ /bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag khyod la snying nas bsam pa dang 'thun par byed cing / khyod ci dgos pa bya ba'i phyir snying nas
lus 'bul lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de la stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya rnams rgyan thams cad kyis klubs/ shing rta lnga
brgya po de rnams kyang rgyan gyis brgyan nas/ thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la phul te/ rigs kyi bu khyod la bu mo 'di rnams dang / shing rta lnga brgya po
'di rnams yongs su spyad par bya ba'i phyir dbul lo zhes smras so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la rigs kyi bu legs so/ /legs so zhes nas/ legs pa byin te/ rigs
kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /gtong ba'i sems de lta bu dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /chos smra ba la de ltar mchod pa byas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa nyan nus par 'gyur

ro sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gtong ba de lta bu la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun du bsgrubs/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa yang yongs su dris so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams dang shing rta lnga brgya blangs so/ /

blangs nas kyang rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rigs kyi bu de nyid la slar byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa stan las langs nas bdag gi khyim du song ngo / /nyi ma yang
nub par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/ /bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba ni legs pa ma yin la/
bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa bdag gi khyim nas chos 'chad pa'i phyir ma byung gi bar du 'greng ba 'am/ 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis
kyis bsdad do snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos kyis 'phags pa lo bdun du snyoms par zhugs pa gcig la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa las byung ba stong phrag grangs med tshad med pa las gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba yang lo bdun du
'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi skyed/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / ro la chags pa mi skyed kyi/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rigs kyi bu de gang la 'dug nas chos 'chad pa'i chos kyi stan gting bar bya na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di langs pa
ji tsam na mthong snyam pa dang / sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa 'chad pa'i sa phyogs de yang

phyag dar byas shing chag chag gis btab la/ me tog sna tshogs kyis kun du gtor to snyam pa las bsam pa gzhan med do/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyang / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rjes su slob cing spyod lam gnyis po de nyid kyis sdod cing 'khod do/ /bya ba thams cad kyang de dang rjes su 'thun par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ste/ langs nas kyang grong khyer gyi dbus su chos 'chad do/ /zhes zer ba'i sgra nam mkha' las byung ba/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas thos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas sgra de thos nas/ dga' mgu yid rangs rab

tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po rnams dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de byi dor byas nas/ chos kyi stan rin po che sna bdun las byas pa yang
bting ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po thams cad kyis bdag cag gi bla gos lus las phud de stan gang la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis
'phags pa 'dug ste/ chos 'chad pa'i chos kyi stan der bla gos lnga brgya stan du bting ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/ sa phyogs de chag chag

gdab pa'i phyir kho ra khor yug tu chu btsal na/ sa phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i chu bdud sdig to can gyis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba chu ma rnyed nas/
sems la sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi dga' ba dang / sems gzhan du gyur te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med par gyur cing / mchod pa de yang ngan par 'gyur ba de lta bur bya ba'i phyir/ chu de med pa
byas pas chu ma rnyed par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/ /'o na bdag gi lus phug ste/ sa phyogs 'di khrag gis chag chag
gdab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i lus la ma rung bar gyur na bdag gi lus nges par 'jig

par 'gyur ba 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus don med par chud zos pa bas 'di ltar byas na bdag gi lus med par gyur kyang bla'o/ /bdag gi lus stong phrag du ma 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhi dang /

'dod pa'i mtshan mar 'khor ba na yang dang yang du 'khor ba'i tshe/ chud zos kyi gnas 'di lta bu dag tu ni ma song ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba mtshon rnon po zhig thogs
te bdag gi lus kun phug nas/ sa phyogs de kun bdag gi khrag gis chag chag btab bo/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rjes su slob pas/ thams cad kyis mtshon rnon po blangs nas/ bdag cag gi lus phug ste/ sa phyogs de bdag cag gi khrag gis chag chag btab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang / bu mo de rnams kyang sems gzhan du ma gyur te/ bdud sdig to can gyis dge ba'i phyogs la bar chad bya ba'i skabs rnyed par yang ma gyur to/ /de nas lha'i

dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di de ltar chos 'dod pa dang / de ltar yi dam la brtan pa dang / go cha chen po bgos pa dang / bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas 'di ltar sems can

rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las yongs su thar bar bya bar sems pa de ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de thams cad lha'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs so/ /

sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug kyang lha'i tsan dan gyi chu'i dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tshad brgya'i bar du bsang bar byas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / khyod chos 'dod pa dang / chos tshol ba bla na med pa de legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu sngon

gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / brtson 'grus de lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub bsgrubs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to/ /bdag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis
'phags pa'i chos kyi stan ni bting zin/ sa phyogs 'di yang chag chag btab cing phyag dar byas zin na/ sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog gis gtor ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos 'chad pa la gtor ba'i me tog bdag gis ga las rnyed snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba
la 'di skad smras so/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man dA ra ba 'di rnams khyer la/ 'di dag gis sa phyogs 'di khyod kyis me tog gis gtor cig /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po chos kyis 'phags pa chos kyi stan la 'dug cing / chos 'chad pa la yang gtor cig ces nas/ des lha'i me tog man dA ra ba khal bzhi brgya de la byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas me tog de dag blangs nas/ me tog kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhag go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa lo bdun lon pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ chos kyi stan gang na 'dug pa der song nas/ stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong du mas
yongs su bskor/ mdun du byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'chad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya
dang bcas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la me tog gis mchod pa byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa mthong nas dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa yid la byed pa rtse gcig tu gyur pa de lta bu'i bde ba rab tu thob par gyur/
de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chos 'chad pa ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par dben pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam par dben no/ /chos thams cad mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi g.yo ba
nyid do/ /chos thams cad sems pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sems pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mnan pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnan pa med pa
nyid do/ /chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /

chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do/ /nam mkha'
mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /ri rab lta bur rnam pa sna

tshogs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid do/ /nam mkha' ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa nyid do/ /gzugs mtha' yas

pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /

sa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha'

yas pa nyid do/ /nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /rdo rje lta bur chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'jig pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dmigs su med

pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/ /

chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de bzhin
du 'dug pa las/ de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nges par byed do/ /chos thams cad rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad sems pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag

pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab rnam pa sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

sa'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi phyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams

cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad spyod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bshad pa na rab tu thob par 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag drug brgya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas rab tu thob par
gyur to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ chos kyis 'phags pa'i le'u ste/ bdun bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //

rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug bcu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /

'tshams rnams dang / bla 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas pa/

dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / tshig 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad pa mthong ba ni/ dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nga byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mdun du byas shing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / tshig 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa'i chos 'chad cing 'dug pa lta bu'o/ /de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pas/ thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /tshe rabs thams cad du yang nams kyang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur to/ /tshe

rabs thams cad du gang dang gang du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon sum du chos nyan to/ /chung ngu na rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas

mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral lo/ /de mi khom pa thams cad spangs shing dal 'byor dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun

dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par

byed pa'o/ /de bas na kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis

tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /

kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan la yang rgyas par ston cig /kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya klag

par bya/ kun chub par bya/ bsgrags par bya/ bstan par bya/ bshad par bya/ kha ton du bya/ rab tu bsgom par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis chung ngu na/ glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal bar bris

te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug tu yang mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa du mas mchod cing / rim gror bya bla mar bya/

sti stang du bya/ mchod par bya/ brjed par bya/ gus par bya ste/ 'di ni ngas rjes su gtams pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rag lus pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /de skad gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin

gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin te/ khyod kyis yongs su spyad do/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis byams pa'i lus kyi las yid du 'ong zhing / yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las yid du 'ong zhing yid

du mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las yid du 'ong zhing yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pas yongs su spyad do/ /de bas na kun dga' bo nga da ltar lus 'di la gnas shing 'tsho skyong ba na/ gang khyod kyis byams

pa dang dga' ba dang / bla mar byas pa de/ nga 'das pa'i 'og tu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la gyis shig /kun dga' bo khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du gtad cing rjes su gtad kyis/ khyod kyis ci nas

kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di med par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig /kun dga' bo ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na gnas pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa yang bzhugs par rig

par bya/ de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad par rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed

pa dang / sgrogs pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / rim gror byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / sti stang du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / rjed par byed pa dang / gus par byed cing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang /

phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pas mchod par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni

sangs rgyas/ mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar rig par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring bar 'khod par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs

dgyes pas de skad bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal chen po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /

tshe dang ldan pa ka ta ya na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa re ba ta dang / tshe dang ldan pa ra hu la dang / 'khor rnam bzhi dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' bar gyur to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste/ bdun bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang /

rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum rdzogs s+ho// //ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M` bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH thugs dam nyi khri 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen myang sgom chos 'bar

gyi thugs dam gser khri la phyi mo byas nas zhus dag lan gnyis dang / nyi khri yer ba ma'i steng nas zhus legs par bgyis bdog pas/ slan chad bri ba rnams kyang 'di kho na bzhin 'dri bar zhu'o/ /bkra shis par gyur cig //

bdag ni skye ba thams cad du/ thub bstan mdzes pa'i rgyan gyur te/ bslab sbyangs yon tan kun ldan pa'i/ mchog tu gyur pa thob par shog 'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dar ba dang / sems can la bde skyid 'byung bar gyur cig / //
